scripts.client:server:sequential: npm run client --command=$npm_config_command && npm run server --command=$npm_config_command
scripts.client:server:parallel: npm run client --command=$npm_config_command & npm run server --command=$npm_config_command
scripts.setup: npm run tests --command=setup & npm run client:server:parallel --command=setup
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.cleanup: npm run --prefix ./client/ cleanup && npm run --prefix ./server/ cleanup && rm -rf ./build/
